verses.name: Jeremiah 13:1
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord unto me, Go and get thee a linen girdle, and put it upon thy loins, and put it not in water.

verses.name: Jeremiah 13:2
verses.text: So I got a girdle according to the word of the Lord, and put it on my loins.

verses.name: Jeremiah 13:3
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came unto me the second time, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 13:4
verses.text: Take the girdle that thou hast got, which is upon thy loins, and arise, go to Euphrates, and hide it there in a hole of the rock.

verses.name: Jeremiah 13:5
verses.text: So I went, and hid it by Euphrates, as the Lord commanded me.
